name: MentalList
0:
”Alexa, ask Mental List reveal the value.”
”Alexa, ask Mental List what is the card?”
”Alexa, ask Mental List what is the selection?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mental list
des:
A card is freely selected by an audience member. 

If the card is the four of clubs, a magician who knows the secret might say, "Ask Mental List reveal the value."

Mental List will respond that selected card is the four of diamonds.

The instructions for operating Mental List are available with a subscription from http://learnedmagic.com.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
